question.text: Why should you be cautious when going past this stationary bus?

explanation.text: A stationary bus at a bus stop can hide pedestrians who might try to cross the road just in front of it. Drive at a speed that will enable you to respond safely if you have to.

answer.text: There is traffic approaching in the distance
The driver may open the door
People may cross the road in front of it
The road surface will be slippery
